name: SUPER SAUCER COW DEFENSE FORCE (0.0.01)
description:
first month (and a bit, honestly) of work on this project. proof of concept prototype

a 2d single-screen shooter inspired by missile command and twinstick roguelites

graphics still need work, no music. unbalanced wreck. but kind of fun.

leave comments please. what upgrades do you like to see? how is the ammo scaling? do you like cows?
